gist.headline: Fresh Paint: AIImageEditor
gist.blurb: We've added a shiny new image generation and editing studio to the Creative showcase. Time to get artistic!
gist.summary: Added AIImageEditor, a React-based image generation and editing studio, to the community apps directory.
gist.impact: Users can now discover and use this new tool for advanced image manipulation directly from our apps showcase.
gist.visual_concept: The Pollinations bee as a digital artist using the new tool. Symbols: Digital canvas, paintbrushes, magic wand tool, retro UI.
gist.image_prompt: Cozy pixel art scene of the cute bee mascot wearing a tiny red painter's beret, working on a digital canvas displayed on a retro computer monitor. Soft lime green (#ecf874) and pastel gradient background. Chunky retro sprites of paintbrushes and magic wands floating nearby. Warm lighting, lo-fi vibes like Stardew Valley. Text in pixel font: 'AI EDITOR'. Nostalgic but beautiful, emotionally warm.
